66103.<%sL_FURNITURE>を置いたので\n家に遊びにきてくれた人が \nメッ:
I've put up a <%sL_FURNITURE> so that people who come to my house can leave a message! Each person can leave 3 messages a day... You
can save up to 30 messages per day. When someone leaves a message, the slime will light up, so you'll know... Messages can also
be viewed by visitors, so you can write your own messages there too!

66104.モーモンバザーを置いたので\n家に遊びにきてくれた人向けの\nお店を開くことが:
Now that you have the Mormon Bazaar, you can open a shop for people who come to your house! In the Mormon Bazaar, you can put a
price on the items you've placed in your storage furniture to sell them. When the item sells, Mormon will turn into Pink Mormon!
When there's nothing left to sell, he turns scary... Only the owner of the house gets the money. If you have 999 sales that you haven't
received, you can't sell any more items. Now, let's set up the items for sale!

66108.『売り物を設定する』では\n収納家具に入れたアイテムに 値段をつけることで\nそ:
In the "Set for Sale" section, you can put a price on the items in your storage furniture to make them available for sale. You can set
a price for each type of item. Up to 60 items can be sold... If you set a price for an item and put it up for sale, all items of the same
type in your storage furniture will become available for sale! If you don't want to sell items of the same type, please don't put them
in your storage furniture, such as under the roof or in the storage area!

66221.モーモンバザーを置いたので\n家に遊びにきてくれた人向けの\nお店を開くことが:
Now that you have the Mormon Bazaar, you can open a shop for people who come to your house! In the Mormon Bazaar, you can put a
price on the items you've placed in your storage furniture to sell them. When the item sells, Mormon will turn into Pink Mormon!
When there's nothing left to sell, he turns scary... Only the owner of the house gets the money. If you have 999 sales that you haven't
received, you can't sell any more items. Now, let's set up the items for sale!

a price for each type of item. Up to 60 items can be sold... If you set a price for an item and put it up for sale, all items of the same
type in your storage furniture will become available for sale! If you don't want to sell items of the same type, please don't put them
in your storage furniture, such as under the roof or in the storage area!

82272.郵便ポストを 置いたので\n家から 手紙や荷物を送ったり \n直接 荷物を入れら:
Now that we have a mailbox, we can send letters, packages, and drop off packages directly from the house! Only the owner of
the house can send or receive packages from the mailbox... Only authorized people can put packages in the mailbox... You can change the
permission to put a package in the mailbox by going to the door menu... The number of packages that can be placed in the mailbox is
determined by the post office...

82273.『すごしかたを変更』から 仲間モンスターの\nお庭でのすごしかたを 設定すること:
You can set up the way your monsters play in the garden by clicking on "Change play style". "Relax in the garden" lets you send
your monsters to a monster's house... "Strolling" lets your monsters stroll through your neighborhood... Both can be toggled at
any time...

82274.『モンスターをひっこめる』から\nおうちにはなした 仲間モンスターを\nひっこめ:
From "Hiding the Monsters", you can hide the
monsters that you lost at home.

82275.『お庭でのんびり』から 仲間モンスターを\nモンスターのおうちに はなすことがで:
From "Relax in the Garden", you can release your fellow monsters into their homes...When you release a companion monster into a monster's home, it will not leave your party... You can also pet your companion
monster while you're out adventuring...If you want to change your play style, you can do so by clicking on the "Change Play Style" button that appears after you've
released a fellow monster...

82276.『お世話の記録』から \nあなたの仲間モンスターを\nなでてくれた人を 確認する:
You can see who has petted your monsters in your care record. When you receive a gift from a monster, your care record will be
reset and a new record will be created.

82277.モンスターのおうちを 置いたので\nお庭に 仲間モンスターをはなすことが\nでき:
Now that you've set up your monster house, you can release your monsters into the garden! When you release a monster, you can
choose whether to let it live in the monster house or go for a walk around the neighborhood... You can also pet your
companion monsters only in the residential village. You can also pet other people's monsters... Each time a monster is petted,
its master receives a gift as a thank you... Let's pet them all!

85718.『さかなをだす』から 水そうや\nマルチ水そう 水そう床に入れたさかなを\n取り:
You can remove fish from the aquarium and multi-aquarium aquarium beds from the "Remove Fish" menu. The removed fish will return to
the fish bag. Fish that have been placed in the aquarium from the list of fish to collect will not be returned to the fish bag when
removed from the aquarium, but will disappear.

85719.『さかなをいれる』から \n水そうや マルチ水そう 水そう床に\n釣ったさかなを:
You can place your fish in the aquarium or multi-aquarium aquarium by clicking on the "Place Fish" button. The size of the fish in
each aquarium is determined by the size of the aquarium. The multi-aquarium can hold up to a large size fish, while the aquarium floor can
hold any size fish.

85720.『さかなをみる』から 水そうや\nマルチ水そう 水そう床に入っているさかなの\n:
You can view information about the fish in your aquarium or multi-aquarium aquarium floor from the "View Fish" menu. When you visit
other people's houses, you can see what kind of fish they have in their aquariums!

aquarium on display!

281314.家具を１個 加工することで その家具が\n配置上限数以内なら 好きなだけ取り出せ:
By processing a piece of furniture, it becomes a "replica furniture" that can be taken out as many times as you like as long as the number
of furniture is within the limit of placement. You can select the destination from "items", "itemwarehouse", "furniture & garden furniture
storage", and "furniture in storage". Select the destination from "Process" and check the checkbox of the furniture you want to make
into a replica. If you make a replica furniture, it will be removed from "Items", "Itemwarehouse", and "Furniture & garden
furniture storage". In the case of "furniture in place", the selected furniture will disappear and a replica furniture will be
placed in the same position. Replicas cannot be made from the "Evacuated furniture" in "Placed furniture" when moving or rebuilding,
and must be placed from "Place replica furniture" in "Housing" in the item menu or from "Replica furniture" in the door menu.
Please place the replica furniture. Also, if you put replica furniture, it will not return to items and cannot be stored in furniture &
garden furniture storage or storage. Replica furniture cannot be placed in someone else's home. They cannot be traded, sold, or bought.
Some furniture cannot be made into replicas. You cannot make a replica furniture if it does not have a Wardrobe icon in the "See More"
section. Black Wardrobe icons are the ones that can be made into replicas. A white Wardrobe icon indicates a furniture that can
be made into a replica. Replicated furniture will be marked with a white Wardrobe icon in the "Furniture in Placement" section.

281315.庭具を１個 加工することで その庭具が\n配置上限数以内なら 好きなだけ取り出せ:
By processing one garden furniture, it becomes a "replica garden furniture" that can be taken out as many times as you like as long as the
garden furniture is within the placement limit. You can select the destination from "items", "itemwarehouse", "furniture & garden
furniture storage", and "garden furniture in place". Select the destination from "Process" and check the checkbox of the garden furniture
you want to make a replica. If you make replica garden furniture, it will be removed from "Items", "Itemwarehouse", and "Furniture
& garden furniture storage". In the case of "Garden furniture in place", the selected garden furniture will disappear and a replica
garden furniture will be placed in the same position. Replicas cannot be made from the "Evicted garden furniture" of the "Placed
garden furniture" when moving or rebuilding, and must be placed from "Place replica garden furniture" in the "Housing" item menu or
"Replica garden furniture" in the "Door" menu. Please place replica garden furniture from "Place replica garden furniture" in the
"Housing" menu of the item menu or "Replica garden furniture" in the door menu. If you put replica garden furniture, it will not return
to "items" and cannot be stored in "furniture & garden furniture storage" or "storage". Replica garden furniture cannot be placed in
someone else's home. It cannot be traded or sold. Some garden furniture cannot be made into replicas. If there is no Wardrobe icon in
the "See More" section, it cannot be made into a replica garden furniture. Black Wardrobe icons are garden furniture that can be made
into replicas. White Wardrobe icons are garden furniture that can be made into replicas. Replicated garden furniture will have a white
Wardrobe mark in the "Garden furniture in place" section.

received, you can't sell any more items. Now, let's set up the items for sale!

type in your storage furniture will become available for sale! If you don't want to sell items of the same type, please don't put them
in your storage furniture, such as under the roof or in the storage area!

your monsters to a monster's house... "Strolling" lets your monsters stroll through your neighborhood... Both can be toggled at
any time...

301374.『お世話の記録』から \nあなたの仲間モンスターを\nなでてくれた人を 確認する:
You can see who has petted your monsters in your care record. When you receive a gift from a monster, your care record will be
reset and a new record will be created.

reset and a new record will be created.

301378.郵便ポストを 置いたので\n家から 手紙や荷物を送ったり \n直接 荷物を入れら:
Now that we have a mailbox, we can send letters, packages, and drop off packages directly from the house! Only the owner of
the house can send or receive packages from the mailbox... Only authorized people can put packages in the mailbox... You can change the
permission to put a package in the mailbox by going to the door menu... The number of packages that can be placed in the mailbox is
determined by the post office...

301382.『さかなをいれる』から \n水そうや マルチ水そう 水そう床に\n釣ったさかなを:
You can place your fish in the aquarium or multi-aquarium aquarium by clicking on the "Place Fish" button. The size of the fish in
each aquarium is determined by the size of the aquarium. The multi-aquarium can hold up to a large size fish, while the aquarium floor can
hold any size fish.

301383.『さかなをいれる』から \n水そうや マルチ水そう 水そう床に\n釣ったさかなを:
You can place your fish in the aquarium or multi-aquarium aquarium by clicking on the "Place Fish" button. The size of the fish in
each aquarium is determined by the size of the aquarium. The multi-aquarium can hold up to a large size fish, while the aquarium floor can
hold any size fish.

301384.『さかなをだす』から 水そうや\nマルチ水そう 水そう床に入れたさかなを\n取り:
You can remove fish from the aquarium and multi-aquarium aquarium beds from the "Remove Fish" menu. The removed fish will return to
the fish bag. Fish that have been placed in the aquarium from the list of fish to collect will not be returned to the fish bag when
removed from the aquarium, but will disappear.

the fish bag. Fish that have been placed in the aquarium from the list of fish to collect will not be returned to the fish bag when
removed from the aquarium, but will disappear.

301386.『さかなをみる』から 水そうや\nマルチ水そう 水そう床に入っているさかなの\n:
You can view information about the fish in your aquarium or multi-aquarium aquarium floor from the "View Fish" menu. When you visit
other people's houses, you can see what kind of fish they have in their aquariums!

301590.家具を１個 加工することで その家具が\n配置上限数以内なら 好きなだけ取り出せ:
By processing a piece of furniture, it becomes a "replica furniture" that can be taken out as many times as you like as long as the number
of furniture is within the limit of placement. You can select the destination from "items", "itemwarehouse", "furniture & garden furniture
storage", and "furniture in storage". Select the destination from "Process" and check the checkbox of the furniture you want to make
into a replica. If you make a replica furniture, it will be removed from "Items", "Itemwarehouse", and "Furniture & garden
furniture storage". In the case of "furniture in place", the selected furniture will disappear and a replica furniture will be
placed in the same position. Replicas cannot be made from the "Evacuated furniture" in "Placed furniture" when moving or rebuilding,
and must be placed from "Place replica furniture" in "Housing" in the item menu or from "Replica furniture" in the door menu.
Please place the replica furniture. Also, if you put replica furniture, it will not return to items and cannot be stored in furniture &
garden furniture storage or storage. Replica furniture cannot be placed in someone else's home. They cannot be traded, sold, or bought.
Some furniture cannot be made into replicas. You cannot make a replica furniture if it does not have a Wardrobe icon in the "See More"
section. Black Wardrobe icons are the ones that can be made into replicas. A white Wardrobe icon indicates a furniture that can
be made into a replica. Replicated furniture will be marked with a white Wardrobe icon in the "Furniture in Placement" section.

301591.庭具を１個 加工することで その庭具が\n配置上限数以内なら 好きなだけ取り出せ:
By processing one garden furniture, you can take out as many replica garden furniture as you like as long as the number of garden
furniture is within the limit. You can choose where to process from "items", "Itemwarehouse", "garden furniturewarehouse",
"furniture & garden furniture storage", and "garden furniture in My Town". Select the destination from "Process" and check the
checkbox of the garden furniture you want to make into a replica. If you make replica garden furniture, it will be removed from
"Items", "Itemwarehouse", and "Furniture & garden furniture storage". In the case of "garden furniturewarehouse" and "My Town's
garden furniture", the selected garden furniture will be removed and a replica garden furniture will be placed in the same location.
You cannot replicate garden furniture from the "Evacuated garden furniture" of the "Garden furniture in place" when moving or rebuilding,
but you can place replicas from the "Place replica garden furniture" in the "Housing" menu of the "item" menu or the "Replica garden
furniture" in the "Door" menu. Please place replica garden furniture from "Place replica garden furniture" in the "Housing" menu of the
item menu or "Replica garden furniture" in the door menu. If you put replica garden furniture, it will not return to "items" and
cannot be stored in "furniture & garden furniture storage" or "storage". Replica garden furniture cannot be placed in someone
else's home. It cannot be traded or sold. Some garden furniture cannot be made into replicas. If the item does not have a Wardrobe icon in
the "See More" section, it cannot be made into a replica garden furniture. Black Wardrobe icons are garden furniture that can be made
into replicas. White Wardrobe icons are garden furniture that can be made into replicas. Replicated garden furniture will have a white
Wardrobe mark in "Garden furniture in place" and "Garden furniture in My Town".

Please watch the broadcast with good manners and enjoy the show!
